channel.title: Bank? MUST SEE!
channel.description:
Ehm I am very new on this forums but I already know alot of java (Scar Nexus...) But I have just made a test server based on pimpscape :) But I want to change bank name and what it says on the top where Can I find and change this :) Please dont flame me I have just joined an hr ago :)
Btw I am releasing it when this bug is done
Its pivotscape Dont call me a "Leecher" Cause all I did was edit it slightly :)
Oh yeah
How Do I get it say in runserver.bat Pivotscape has started I tried [code=java]echo Pivot scape has started :D title PivotScape java -cp . server pause[/code] But that not worked

item.title: Bank? MUST SEE!
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

im jw WHY you all make life complicated!!!..

@echo off color 0c javac *.java pause
thats a compiler…
if you wanna get complicated keep it simple/complicated

@echo off color 0c :menu echo Enter C to compile echo Enter R to run echo. set /p menu= if %menu%==c goto compile if %menu%==r goto run :compile cls javac *.java pause exit :run cls java *.java

bows

then bank thing theres a sendframe somewhere in client.java

Read full topic

It’s in server.java like i said…

just search pimpscape or whatever its at and change it to what u want
save and your done…
idk how people came up with banks…

item.title: Bank? MUST SEE!
item.dc:creator: @untelo untelo
item.description:
@untelo wrote:

If it says something like pimpscape is starting, look for that in server.java and change it

and

@echo off title PivotScape Server color 0a echo :--------------------------------------: echo :-----------PivotScape server----------: echo :---------------By Pivot---------------: echo :--------------------------------------: java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
for the runserver.bat

and if it says like pimpscape bank, look for that in client.java and change it.

Read full topic

item.title: Bank? MUST SEE!
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

@ECHO OFF
title Client Start



:info
	CLS
	ECHO                                 !!!(name)!!!
	ECHO                            Updating Client By: (name)
	ECHO --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	ECHO Type run to start the (Name).
	ECHO Type Exit to Exit.
	SET option=
	ECHO.
	SET /p option=Choose an option. 
	if %option%==run goto runclient
	if %option%==Exit exit

:runclient
	CLS
	java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar client
	PAUSE
	CLS
	GOTO info

java -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0
pause
PAUSE
GOTO info

Do you even have any idea of what this does, Codesoft?

Read full topic

item.title: Bank? MUST SEE!
item.dc:creator: @Codesoft Codesoft
item.description:
@Codesoft wrote:

Open your run.bat by right clicking and edit delete everything in it and put this, and just fill in the (name) spots.

[code]@ECHO OFF
title Client Start

:info
CLS
ECHO !!!(name)!!!
ECHO Updating Client By: (name)
ECHO --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ECHO Type run to start the (Name).
ECHO Type Exit to Exit.
SET option=
ECHO.
SET /p option=Choose an option.
if %option%==run goto runclient
if %option%==Exit exit

:runclient
CLS
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar client
PAUSE
CLS
GOTO info

java -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0
pause
PAUSE
GOTO info
[/code]

Read full topic
